Congressional Reports: Referred to the House Calendar and ordered to be printed

The Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, to whom was referred the bill (H.R. 3576) to designate the United States courthouse located at 401 South Michigan Street in South Bend, Indiana, as the ``Robert Kurtz Rodibaugh United States Courthouse'', having considered the same, report favorably thereon with amendments and recommend that the bill as amended to pass.
